body:
Banner by Cyclops!

Hello players of Avicus,

After months of planning, we’re very excited to announce Battle of Eternity, the 3rd Avicus Network Tournament! 

Information Thread: https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/2c8ba13a6
body_tagged:
Banner by Cyclops!

Hello players of Avicus,

After months of planning, we’re very excited to announce Battle of Eternity, the 3rd Avicus Network Tournament!

title: Introducing T3 :: Battle of Eternity!

Aw, someone a lil' salty that he can't play?

Enjoy the fun of NOT playing! With any team! Ever!

replies.body:
Lol it's iiOmega! You calling me salty, I have multiple recordings of scrimming Jalepenos of you getting salty, and Legoche has a bunch too.

Also, do you think I'd want to play? Looking at the future of Avicus and the staff team (no offense to some).

So please get some brain cells, and then you can argue with me.

And @Myv

Your fearless leader Patrikano told me.

'Your fearless leader Patrikano told me.'
Uh, thanks?

But we all know it's sarcasm,
Look, please stop going after my team? Heck maybe we will lose first round. Maybe we won't?

Yeah, we do use chat currently. Though we are planning to use teamspeak and probably will this tourney,
also I told you that like months ago...

And aren't you the one who got banned for disrespect?

Well i'm off!
-Pat

reply_to.body:
Other post glitched out, if it appears good for you.

You have recordings of me from 4-6 months ago, oooooooh noooooo :O!!
I feel so insulted ;-;. 

Pretty Ironic coming from the guy who got banned for being "Mean" and a few infracts from "Hackusating" Woah, didn't know we're speaking to the King of Salt :O , Consider me humbled.

Whats that smell on your post? Reeks of uneducated, brainless little kiddy to me, someone needs to take a shower to wash of the salt!

Can you wash off the salt before replying? It stinks worse than your uneducated and ignorant smell, Ew.

Much love,
"iiOmega"
